disobedience.question: Did I use my words to ridicule or scorn the Church?

blasphemy.question: Did you swear to God, using His holy name carelessly in conversation?
blasphemy.description: This sin violates the Second Commandment by treating God's holy name with disrespect rather than reverence.

extracted_data_phrases: while knowingly in a state of mortal sin that profanes the real presence of Christ
blasphemy.question: Did I receive Holy Communion while knowingly in a state of mortal sin that profanes the real presence of Christ?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

extracted_data_phrases: while knowingly in a state of grave sin
blasphemy.question: Did I receive Holy Communion while knowingly in a state of grave sin, thereby profaning the real presence of Christ?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

ambition.question: Did my desire for power and dominance influence the way I lead, guide, and interact with those in my care?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: of leadership roles and positions of influence
for others ' perspectives , needs , and well - being
ambition.question: Have I allowed my pursuit of leadership roles and positions of influence to compromise my consideration for others' perspectives, needs, and well-being?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

ambition.question: Did your desire for power and dominance influence your decisions in managing household expenses, budgeting for long-term savings goals, or pursuing leadership roles at work?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

greed.question: Did I make accumulating wealth and material possessions the driving force in my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

greed.question: Did I make wealth and material possessions a driving force in my life, so that they become idols replacing trust in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Have I used my authority or power to mistreat, harass, or discriminate against others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by my words , actions , or presence in social media ,
oppression.question: Have I by my words, actions, or presence in social media, mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: by exerting unjust influence or authority over them
oppression.question: Have I mistreated others by exerting unjust influence or authority over them?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the good things in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: to your own skills and abilities
autonomy.question: Did you attribute your accomplishments to your own skills and abilities, forgetting to acknowledge God's guiding hand in achieving them?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished others would be deprived of their blessings, so that I might feel more content in my own life?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
perhaps after social gatherings , travel , or other indulgent activities
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps after social gatherings, travel, or other indulgent activities?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable through my daily habits
beyond what 's reasonable through my daily habits
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable through my daily habits, often prioritizing culinary pleasures over moderation?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable

gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through casual conversations with friends, family, or acquaintances?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I used my words to delight in speaking about others' weaknesses, even if what I shared was true?
